## Importing/Processing Data

```{r}
data <- read_csv("sales_revenue_clean.csv")
```
## Custom functions

#### Plot function
```{r}
plot_months <- function(series,  mainLab = "title") {
  Month=c('J','F','M','A','M','J','J','A','S','O','N','D')
  
  plot(series, main = mainLab)
  points(series,pch=Month)
}
```

#### Series diagnostics
```{r}
stationary_test <- function(series){
  acf(series)
  pacf(series)
  print(runs(series))
  print(shapiro.test(series))
}
```

```{r}
totalRev <- ts(data$Tot_Revenue,start=c(1990,1),frequency=12)
plot_months(totalRev)
```

```{r}
totalRev2 = window(totalRev, start = c(2008, 1))
plot_months(totalRev2)
```

```{r}
acf(totalRev2)
pacf(totalRev2)

```


```{r}
# bc = BoxCox.ar(totalRev2)
```


```{r}
recRev = totalRev2^(-1)

plot(recRev)
acf(recRev)
pacf(recRev)

```



```{r}
diffRev = diff(recRev)
plot(diffRev)
```


```{r}
seasDiffRev = diff(diffRev, lag = 12)
plot(seasDiffRev)
acf(seasDiffRev)
pacf(seasDiffRev)
```


```{r}
eacf(seasDiffRev)
plot(armasubsets(seasDiffRev, nar = 12, nma = 12))
```


```{r}
model1 = arima(seasDiffRev, order = c(0,1,0), seasonal = list(order=c(0,1,2),period= 12))
model2 = arima(seasDiffRev, order = c(1,1,0), seasonal = list(order=c(0,1,2),period= 12))
model3 = arima(seasDiffRev, order = c(1,1,0), seasonal = list(order=c(0,1,1),period= 12))
model5 = arima(seasDiffRev, order = c(2,1,3), seasonal = list(order=c(0,1,2),period= 12))
```


```{r}
model1
model2
model3
```



```{r}
library(forecast)
model4 <-auto.arima(recRev)
model4
```


```{r}
res1 = rstandard(model1) 
res2 = rstandard(model2)
res3 = rstandard(model3)
res4 = rstandard(model4)
res5 = rstandard(model5)
```



```{r}
runs(res1)
hist(res1)
qqnorm(res1)
qqline(res1)
shapiro.test(res1)
LB.test(model1)
```
